briefdescription.para: Build a blood pressure measurement characteristic.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to buffer to hold the built blood pressure measurement characteristic.

briefdescription.para: Initialize the Blood Pressure profile sensor.

parameterdescription.para: WSF handler ID of the application using this service.

briefdescription.para: Start periodic blood pressure measurement. This function starts a timer to perform periodic measurements.

parameterdescription.para: WSF event designated by the application for the timer.
Index of intermediate cuff pressure CCC descriptor in CCC descriptor handle table.
Index of blood pressure measurement CCC descriptor in CCC descriptor handle table.

briefdescription.para: This function is called by the application when the periodic measurement timer expires.
Set the blood pressure measurement flags.
Set the intermediate cuff pressure flags.
